title: 'Our business is truth' - China editor tells BBC to open up on women's pay
text:
'Our business is truth' - China editor tells BBC to open up on women's pay Wednesday, January 31, 2018 - 01:37 
The BBC is failing to live up to its own editorial mission to report the truth by denying it has a problem with gender discrimination on pay, its former China editor Carrie Gracie told the British parliament’s media committee on Wednesday. Rough cut (no reporter narration)
